artist: Artist: Kiki Smith; Author: Poetry by Leslie Scalapino; Publisher: Granary Books, Inc., New York
creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
description: white suede-covered book with accordion-folded pages; text and images in black and red of nude women being bitten and attacked by large carnivorous cats and wolves; tan clamshell storage box

title: The Animal is in the World Like Water in Water
